title: AppSec Advocate @ Security Journey, Co-Founder
bio: Dustin is an AppSec Advocate at Security Journey, co-founder of Katilyst, and a cybersecurity thought leader and consultant. He helps organizations build developer-centric security cultures through effective security champion programs, training, and behavior-based enablement. A frequent speaker and writer, Dustin focuses on building secure habits through influence, negotiation, and motivation. He is also the author of the Security Champion Program Success Guide and co-leads The League of Cyber Defense Champions community.
